titles: A commentation on the late wonderful discovery of the new popish plot, being the Jesuites diabolick. Device to inveagle the son to betray the father.
notes: Verse: "In spite of fate, the Jesuite like the devil".
Imperfect: faded inspots, with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library. .
